revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Intelbras |model=NBOX |revision=v1.0 |est_release_date=03/14/2013 |fcc_date= |manuf_country=Brazil |is_manuf=No |manuf=Zioncom |manuf_model=WR2030-W11 |manuf_rev=Rev1.2 |availability=Brazil only |type=wireless router |fcc_id= |ic_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Ralink |cpu1_model=RT3352F |cpu1_cspeed= |fla1=8 |fla1_brand=Spansion |fla1_model=S25FL064PIF |ram1=64 |ram1_brand=ESMT |ram1_model=M12L2561616A-6T |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag=yes,, 14-pin header,, J5,, |serial=yes,, 4-pin header,, J4,, |wi1_chip1_brand=Ralink |wi1_chip1_model=RT3352F |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=RP-SMA |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |flags= |stock_boot=U-Boot;1.1.3; |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid=NBox |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=10.0.0.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui=00:1A:3F |oui_eth=00:1A:3F }} {{TagLine|Wireless N300 Router}} :[http://www.intelbras.com.br/Produtos/Redes/Redes-sem-fio/Roteadores/NBOX-Roteador-Wireless-N-300-Mbps Product page]{{•}}[http://www.intelbras.com.br/arquivos/index.php?id=3554&idm=1&count=1 Manual]{{•}}[http://www.intelbras.com.br/arquivos/index.php?id=3551&idm=1&count=1 Datasheet]
"WR2030-W11", "Rev:1.2", "800000698", "1249", "ROHS" and :an anti-static warning logo is silkscreened on the board.
*[http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=170977 On the '''DD-WRT''' forums] *[https://forum.openwrt.org/viewtopic.php?id=72612 On the '''OpenWrt''' forums] :Stock bootloader: U-Boot:1.1.3;Ralink UBoot 3.6.0.0; *[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CGK3Qus87j4 YouTube video from '''Intelbras''' about the device] (BR) :Video dated 2013-03-14 (ANATEL)
==Images== <gallery> File:intelbras_nbox_top_view_case.jpg|Top view with case on the back File:intelbras_nbox_pcv_top_view.jpg|Top view of PCB File:intelbras_nbox_sdram.jpg|Top view, close on SDRAM File:intelbras_nbox_serial_connector.jpg|Top view, close on serial connector (does not need VCC connected) </gallery>[[Has images::internal| ]]
